posts.post_content:
Hello everyone.  I've officially hit the wall and finally believe I am done with the hobby.  I'll be breaking up the cards by type, overall not a whole heck of a lot, and posting on the NET54 B/S/T boards over the course of the week.  I figure I got a few of the cards on here so I may as well give them a shot here again and keep them "in the group" before I go elsewhere.  Paypal/postal money orders preferred.  All prices are delivered and please feel free to ask me any questions.  Thanks!

Group Photos below.

Individual card front/back scans can be found here:
[url]http://s121.beta.photobucket.com/user/billcauley/library/For%20Sale[/url]
